description: This file provides functions to manage environment variable mappings between a common format and framework-specific formats, using YAML templates. It includes utilities for retrieving template paths, parsing YAML configuration files, applying prefixes, and mapping variables in both directions (common to framework-specific and vice versa). It also includes a function to list supported frameworks based on the directory structure.

methods.name: Path get_template_path(framework: str)
methods.description: Returns the filesystem path to the environment template for a given framework.

methods.name: Tuple[Optional[str],Dict[str,str]] parse_template_file(template_path: Path)
methods.description: Reads and parses a YAML template file, extracting optional prefix and mapping dictionary.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] apply_prefix_mapping(common_env: Dict[str, str], prefix: str)
methods.description: Applies a prefix to all environment variable keys in the given dictionary.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] map_common_to_framework(framework: str, common_env: Dict[str, str])
methods.description: Converts a set of common environment variables to framework-specific variables based on template mappings and optional prefix.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] map_framework_to_common(framework: str, framework_env: Dict[str, str])
methods.description: Converts framework-specific environment variables back to the common format.

methods.name: list get_supported_frameworks()
methods.description: Lists available frameworks based on directory structure containing 'env.template' files.

ctags.name: apply_prefix_mapping
ctags.pattern: /^def apply_prefix_mapping(common_env: Dict[str, str], prefix: str) -> Dict[str, str]:$/

ctags.name: map_common_to_framework
ctags.pattern: /^def map_common_to_framework(framework: str, common_env: Dict[str, str]) -> Dict[str, str]:$/

ctags.name: map_framework_to_common
ctags.pattern: /^def map_framework_to_common(framework: str, framework_env: Dict[str, str]) -> Dict[str, str]:$/
